input.sentences: when i got to the market i bought a lot of stuff .
some of the stores were closed .
there was a lot of garbage on the floor .
i looked through some of it to see if there was anything useful .
i found an old native american headdress so i took it home to give to my kid .
output.sentences: Yesterday we hit the stuff market lot.
There were so many stores that were closed.
There was a lot of garbage on the floor.
We still looked through some of the stuff to see what we could find.
When we left to go home we saw a kid in a native costume.
